Key Match Events: Indiana Pacers broke a 56-all halftime tie with the first five points of the second half
Indiana used a pivotal 40-point third quarter to seize control
Indiana capped its big third quarter with a late 12-5 run that extended an eight-point lead to 96-82
Post-Match Reflections: Phoenix continues to create consternation over what’s wrong

Booker, Durant and Bradley Beal were supposed to form the nucleus of a title contender. Instead, they’ve lost seven of eight and 10 of 13, forcing coach Mike Budenholzer to continue waiting for career win No. 500
Indiana has finally started playing the way it envisioned over these past 11 games
Haliburton is in sync, the defense has improved and the Pacers have won eight times during that span to reach.500
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tyrese Haliburton scored 27 points and Myles Turner added 20 points, six rebounds and three blocks
Kevin Durant led the Suns with 25 points, seven rebounds and seven assists
Devin Booker had 20 points and nine rebounds and nine assists
Indiana had 35 assists on 46 baskets and only six turnovers while outrebounding the Suns 47-37
